description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync PA302W-BK - 30" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
The 30" MultiSync PA302W is the desktop display for color accurate applications. The GB-R LED backlight provides 99.3% coverage of the Adobe RGB color space while consuming up to 44% less power than comparable CCFL backlights. Utilizing a high performance AH-IPS LCD panel, the MultiSync PA302W will reliably deliver high quality, accurate images simply and beautifully.
